mapper.select: SELECT review_idx, user_id, restaurant_id, comment, create_date, img_url, rating FROM review WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY review_idx DESC

SELECT rw.review_idx as reviewIdx, rw.user_id as userId, rw.restaurant_id as restaurantId, rw.reservation_id as reservationId, d.title as storeName , rw.comment as comment , rw.create_date as createDate, rw.img_url as imgUrl, rw.rating as rating FROM review rw JOIN restaurant_detail d ON rw.restaurant_id = d.restaurant_id WHERE rw.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY rw.create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (user_id, restaurant_id, comment, create_date, img_url, rating, reservation_id) VALUES (#{userId},#{restaurantId}, #{comment}, now(), #{imgUrl}, #{rating} ,#{reservationId} )

INSERT INTO review (user_id, restaurant_id, reservation_id, `comment`, create_date, img_url, rating) SELECT r.user_id, r.restaurant_id, r.reservation_id, #{comment}, NOW(), #{imgUrl}, #{rating} FROM reservation r WHERE r.reservation_id = #{reservationId};
